snippet.title: Pokemon X and Pokemon Y Trailer (HD)
snippet.description:
"Hello everybody ! I have some big news to share with the whole world !"  Join us on Facebook http://FB.com/GameNewsOfficial & Twitter http://twitter.com/gamenewstrailer. Pikachu is back !

Pokémon X and Pokémon Y Trailer (HD). Release date : Coming worldwide October 2013 for Nintendo 3DS. Subscribe now to get the latest game teasers, gameplay trailers, videogame walkthrough and ingame videos !
